item.title: Lilliu Nyco - Un Monde A Changer (Clip Officiel - extrait de 'Robin des Bois')
An issue caused by using `series` with Multi Language and cause unexpected behavior - fixed maybe.
item.description:
First of all

Before I create a new issue or make a pull request with my code, I just want to discuss this issue first to make sure that I wasn’t misunderstanding origin code.

Cause I’m not a front-end or back-end developer, and I’m a new in IT : (

So I started a discuss in this neighborhood : )

item.title: On November 24, 2022, the tragedy in Urumqi, the voice of the people - Record 1
item.description:
The truth will be revealed one day !

We are all the witnesses to history .

Deads rest in peace.

What happened ?

A deadly fire at an apartment building in the regional capital of Urumqi, and people can’t escape to outside, they can’t even go downstairs, people outside also unable to help !

ALL THIS TRAGEDY Caused by the lockdown regulation of COVID-19 of China !

They Block the exit door !

But the dictatorship blocked everything, blocked all the accounts of the domestic media that told the truth.

The authoritarian government even faked the news to make things irrelevant and blamed to resident: the escape door is open and the residents didn’t go downstairs and escape !

What’s wrong with the world ?

Fucking China’s government of Dictatorship !

item.title: Previews problem while running hugo server
item.description:
What happened

There’s some operation caused 404 page while running hugo server .

Once you changed categories and tags during running hugo server , browser’ll jumped to 404 page after you click the changed categories and tags.

Multiple pictures contained

item.title: Kinda love(French version) - Olivier Dion
item.description: This songs have both English and French version. This audio is French version. If you are using Youtube Music , you can switch to Video to listen English version. Youtube link

item.title: Moment-2022-11-26
item.description: I got thanatophobia. Started in 2018, when I was just 16. It stayed with me through the years. And continuing for the rest of my life, until I died. However, I will not give up fighting it, and I will continue to do so for the rest of my life. We are born with nothing, and we leave alone. In this short life, the most precious thing is the journey of life itself.

item.title: Hu Shi's letter to his son
item.description: Hu Shi’s letter to his son: I nurture you, not a kindness, but a biological instinct caused by blood; therefore, since I am unkind to you, you do not need to repay me. Instead, I want to thank you because my life is more complete because of your participation. I just happened to be your father, you just happened to be my daughter and my son, I’m not your prequel, and you’re not my sequel.

item.title: Installing Bilberry Theme
item.description: You will find all information to setup this theme with your hugo site on the official Github Repository.

item.title: Edward Snowden About Privacy
item.description: Arguing that you don’t care about the right to privacy because you have nothing to hide is no different than saying you don’t care about free speech because you have nothing to say.
